name: Adventurer Set
setBonus: Increases chance to get materials from destroying breakables. Increases the amount of scrap picked up by 20%.

name: Akari Set
setBonus: Perfect Dodging increases Firing, Melee, Reload, and Evade Speed for 20 seconds. Slightly increases Evade Window.

name: Bomber Set
setBonus: Increases the Range of the Teamwork trait.

name: Cultist's Set
setBonus: Increases Weapon Mod duration. Mod Power is generated slowly over time.

name: Drifter's Set
setBonus: Sprinting for 1s. Evading, or sliding adds 1 stack of inertia. Inertia stacks increase Ranged and Melee damage. Max 5 Stacks. Lasts 10 seconds. Increases Stamina Regen by 15 per second.

name: Elder Set
setBonus: Dragon Hearts increases the Total damage dealt by all allies standing within 40 meters for 30 seconds. Gives a 25% chance to not consume a Dragon Heart.

name: Hunter Set
setBonus: Increases total Ranged and Weakspot damage. Reduces Spread of firearms by 20%.

name: Leto's Set
setBonus: 3-Piece: Reduces base incoming damage by 10%. Gain an additional 10% per 10% Max Health missing. Max 5 stacks.

name: Ossesus Set
setBonus: Subsequent Ranged or Melee hits against the same enemy increases wearer's Total damage dealt to that enemy. Effect degrades over time. Melee Speed and Fire Rate is increased by 5%.

name: Radiant Set
setBonus: Critical hits increase Crit Chance and Crit damage for 3 seconds, stacking up to 10 times. Recoil is reduced by 15%.

name: Scrapper Set
setBonus: Increases Total damage from all sources dealt by wearer to enemies within 5 meters. Receive 15% less damage from enemies within this range.

name: Slayer Set
setBonus: Reloading increases the Total damage dealt to the next enemy hit with that weapon. Lasts 10 seconds. Reload speed is increased by 10%.

name: Twisted Set
setBonus: At full health, gain a Regrowth stack every 3 seconds which increases Total outgoing Melee and Weapon Mod damage. Stacks 10x. Taking damage removes 1 stack. Regenerates 0.334 Health per second.

name: Void Set
setBonus: After 5 seconds, gain a boost that increases Total damage from all sources. Taking damage transfers the boost from Damage to Damage Reduction for 5 seconds. Standing Aim Movement Speed is increased by 25%.

name: Bandit Set
setBonus: Chance to replace spent bullet on hit. Increases Ammo acquired on pickup by 25%.

name: Labyrinth Set
setBonus: Increase Total Weapon Mod damage. Refunds 10% of Mod Power on use.

name: Carapace Set
setBonus: After avoiding damage for 15s, armor hardens 1x per piece granting damage reduction. Damage removes a stack. If all stacks are removed, gain 10% bonus Movement Speed per piece (30% Max) for 5s. Increases Total damage from all sources by 5% per piece.

name: Warlord's Set
setBonus: Dragon Hearts are no longer consumed for healing. They instead increase Ranged and Melee damage, grant lifesteal, and drain 200% health over 30s. Kills heal 5% over 3s.

name: Scavenger's Set
setBonus: Ammo, Iron, Scrap pickups increase Total Ranged and Melee damage dealt, and reduce incoming damage. Stacks 10x. Lasts 30s. At or below 50% Health, pickups grant 2 stacks. Taking direct damage removes 1 stack. Pull Scrap and Iron materials towards the wearer.
